params.markdown:
Discovery stored procedures are involved with loading data from integrations ( Connectors and LWS ) into the product database to learn about changes in the environment we are managing Identities and Access in. 

Some general rules of thumbs:

* LWS stored procdures need to be quick. None should take a second.
* Iddiscover.exe stored procedures can run for much longer. Minutes to hours in large environments to process large changes in bulk. 

Strategies for improving the performance of these stored procedures include:

* Rebuild fragmented database indexes
* Review if database is low on RAM, CPU, or I/O bandwidth.

If  you continue to encounter problems developers will require database execution plans to review the operation of these procedures.
